name: retroassembly
description: RetroAssembly is a self-hosted web-based IDE for writing assembly programs. It supports syntax highlighting, debugging, and multi-platform code support in a retro-style UI.

features.title: Web
features.description: Write and edit assembly code directly in your browser without local tools

features.title: Syntax Highlighting
features.description: Color-coded assembly instructions for improved readability

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Write code for x86, ARM, MIPS, and other processor architectures

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: See machine code output as you type assembly instructions

features.title: Debugging Tools
features.description: Step through code execution and inspect register values

features.title: Code Examples
features.description: Learn from built-in examples demonstrating common assembly patterns

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Download assembled binaries or hex dumps for use elsewhere

features.title: Retro Aesthetics
features.description: Enjoy a nostalgic terminal-style interface reminiscent of classic computers
